If this device is ever lost or stolen, you can send text message commands to it from another phone by following these steps:
1. From another phone, create a new text message to send to your stolen or lost device.
2. In your text message, type one of the following commands plus your Anti-Theft password.
If this device is ever lost or stolen, you can send text message commands to it from another phone in order to:
Sound an alarm on this device
Locate this device on Google Maps
Wipe personal data from this device
To activate this feature, please create an Anti-Theft password to be used in your text message commands:
